info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 09 at 3:48AM EDT until April 09 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures in the mid 30s will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Iredell, Davie, Rowan, Cleveland, Lincoln, Greater Rutherford and Eastern Polk Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Sunday. For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
